title: Altered Ego Fonts
content:
Altered Ego Fonts is a division of [Sooy+Co](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/sooyco).

AEF sells their fonts through [fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fonts.com), [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop), and [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Myfonts.com).

Retail library includes:  
 [Acolyte](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Acolyte)  
 [American Spirit](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/American%20Spirit)  
 [BenderHead](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/BenderHead)  
 [Chevron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chevron)  
 [Eclectic Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eclectic%20Web)  
 [Eclectic Pixel Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eclectic%20Pixel%20Web)  
 [Eclectics](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eclectics)  
 [Greenbriar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Greenbriar)  
 [Lil Milton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lil%20Milton)  
 [Veritas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veritas)  
 [Verve](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Verve)

Fonts sold through another foundry include:  
 [ITC Coventry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Coventry) ( [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC))  
 [Adobe Verve](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Verve) ( [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe))  
 [Arkeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Arkeo) ( [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream))

**Contact information:**  
Altered Ego Fonts  
Tel 440 322 5142
author: briansooy
